item.title: If Bitcoin breaks $119,000, the mainstream CEX aggregate short liquidation pressure will reach $948 million.
item.description: On July 26th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin surges above $119,000, the total short liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will amount to $948 million. In contrast, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the total long liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will reach $588 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, strength.Consequently, the liquidation chart shows the extent to which the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price, when reached, will have a more pronounced reaction due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: BSC Ecosystem Meme Coin Totakeke's Market Cap Once Reached $15 Million, with a 24-hour Growth of 420%
item.description: On July 26th, according to GMGN market data, the Meme coin Totakeke in the BSC ecosystem briefly reached a market capitalization of 15 million US dollars. Currently, it stands at 12.97 million US dollars, with a 24-hour price increase of 420% and a 24-hour trading volume of 5.8 million US dollars.Furthermore, Totakeke has officially announced its partnership with the well-known Meme project CHEEMS in the BSC ecosystem.BlockBeats Note: Meme coins typically exhibit significant price volatility, often driven by market sentiment and hype surrounding a concept and lacking actual value or a practical use case. Investors should be cautious of the risks involved.

item.title: Gate Launchpad has officially launched the Ika (IKA) token sale, with a total allocation of 200 million IKA.
item.description: July 26th, according to an official announcement, Ika (IKA) has officially been launched on Gate Launchpad and the subscription is now open. It is reported that the subscription period for this event is from July 26, 2025, at 1:00 PM to July 29, 2025, at 1:00 PM (UTC+8). Users can participate in the subscription by using USD1 and GT to subscribe to the IKA token. The subscription price is 1 IKA = 0.001424 GT and 0.025 USD1. The total subscription amount is 200 million IKA.

item.title: Gate Launchpad has launched Ika (IKA) for 1 hour, and the subscription amount has exceeded 1.08 billion USD.
item.description: July 26th. According to official data, the Ika (IKA) project was officially launched on Gate Launchpad at 13:00 (UTC+8) on July 26th. Within just one hour after the event began, the subscription response was extremely enthusiastic, and the subscription amount had already exceeded 108 million US dollars.It is reported that the total quota for this Launchpad is 2 billion IKA. Users can participate by using USD1 and GT. The subscription price is 1 IKA = 0.001424 GT and 0.025 USD1. The subscription will continue until July 29 at 13:00 (UTC+8). Token distribution will be based on the proportion of individual subscription amounts to the total subscription amount per hour. The earlier one subscribes, the higher the allocation, with a first-come, first-served basis.

item.title: Cathie Wood: Ethereum Staking Redemption Demand Surges Possibly Due to Robinhood Offering 2% Reward
item.description: On July 26th, in reply to community queries regarding the sudden increase in the demand for Ethereum staking rewards, Cathie Wood, the CEO of ARK Invest, responded as follows: "Robinhood is providing a 2% matching bonus for cryptocurrency transfers. Venture capitalists and other investors are staking their ETH with Treasury Companies (DATs) in order to double their funds after the lock-up period. Similar to $MSTR and $BMNR, Treasury Company stocks serve as a means for brokerage advisors to offer clients BTC and ETH investment opportunities."

item.title: This week the US Bitcoin spot ETF saw a net inflow of $72.3 million
item.description: On July 26th, based on the monitoring of Farside Investors, this week the net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF is $72.3 million. It includes the following:BlackRock IBIT: +$267.9 millionFranklin FBTC: -$123.2 millionBitwise BITB: +$4.7 millionARK ARKB: -$90.2 millionFranklin EZBC: +$3.5 millionVanEck HODL: +$62.1 millionGrayscale GBTC: -$79.7 millionGrayscale BTC Mini: +$27.2 million

item.title: Publicly traded company Bitcoin Treasury Capital increases its holdings by 10 BTC, bringing its total position to approximately 166 BTC.
item.description: On July 26th, the publicly traded company Bitcoin Treasury Capital announced that it had purchased 10 BTC with an average price of $119,687 per BTC, amounting to approximately $1.2 million (about 11.5 million Swedish Krona). The company currently holds approximately 166 BTC.

item.title: Analyst: This week the selling pressure level has reached an extreme level within the period, but BTC's stable price can be seen as a positive signal
item.description: On July 26th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel took to social media and stated that during this bull market cycle, only 12 weeks have witnessed shorting pressure that is equal to or stronger than this week, accounting for approximately 7.3% of the entire cycle. This implies that the selling pressure this week ranks within the top 7% of historical extremes. However, the price has already rebounded to $117,000—this fact alone can be regarded as a positive signal.

item.title: Binance: Users with at least 200 points can claim a 750 PHY airdrop
item.description: On July 26th, according to official channels, the trading of DePHY Network (PHY) on Binance Alpha is scheduled to begin at 08:00 (UTC) on July 26th, 2025. After the trading commences, users who possess at least 200 Binance Alpha points will be eligible to receive an airdrop of 750 PHY tokens on a first-come, first-served basis.

item.title: 「Chonky Penguin」 CEO revealed that the company had acquired another company in December last year, with the community speculating it to be OpenSea.
item.description: On July 26th, Luca Netz, the CEO of "Chonky Penguin" Pudgy Penguins, was recently interviewed by crypto KOL rasmr (@rasmr_eth). He was asked, "How do you view someone saying that you acquired a company and even speculated that it is OpenSea?"Luca Netz replied that Pudgy Penguins did indeed acquire a company in December last year, but it is not yet the right time to make it public. He will soon announce the exact details of this acquisition.Rasmr said, "It seems that someone is bottom-fishing in OpenSea... Well, I can't say much." Luca Netz just smiled in response.According to HTX market data, possibly influenced by the current community speculation that the news is indeed true, PENGU has seen a 13.44% price increase in the past 24 hours and is now trading at $0.0426.
